title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 3 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 3 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Lord, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我的敌人何其加增。有许多人起来攻击我。

lineList.en: Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.
lineList.cn: 有许多人议论我说，他得不着神的帮助。（细拉）

lineList.en: But thou, O LORD, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.
lineList.cn: 但你耶和华是我四围的盾牌。是我的荣耀，又是叫我抬起头来的。

lineList.en: I cried unto the LORD with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.
lineList.cn: 我用我的声音求告耶和华，他就从他的圣山上应允我。（细拉）

lineList.en: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the LORD sustained me.
lineList.cn: 我躺下睡觉。我醒着。耶和华都保佑我。

lineList.en: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.
lineList.cn: 虽有成万的百姓来周围攻击我，我也不怕。

lineList.en: Arise, O LORD; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你起来。我的神阿，求你救我。因为你打了我一切仇敌的腮骨，敲碎了恶人的牙齿。

lineList.en: Salvation belongeth unto the LORD: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.
lineList.cn: 救恩属乎耶和华。愿你赐福给你的百姓。（细拉）
